original_text: You would not pour your good water onto the streets. So do not waste your love on other women.
korean_text: 어찌하여 네 샘물을 집 밖으로 넘치게 하며 네 도랑물을 거리로 흘러가게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: You would not pour your good water
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 좋은 물을 쏟지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So do not waste your love
